Desc.entry: Associated Board theory of music classes. Classes from complete beginners, for children and adults. Learning in a group and enabling to take grade 5 in less than a year. Instrumental and vocal lessons provided to Sheffield LA schools. Instrumental hire available for a small fee for children taking lessons in Sheffield LA schools. Orchestras and bands rehearse at Bannerdale on a weekly basis during term time.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon to Thurs 8.45am-5.15pm, Fri 8.45am-4.45pm (Office), Mon 10am-4pm, Tues & Fri 2-6pm (Instrument Hire Department)
